ComicInfo.Summary: Several trailers for the series. Only "Tub Club" has been produced in Hack/Slash: The Series (# 7-9) although Hibachi Devil, a minor character that appears in "Renegade Knife: Itai!" returned as a slasher in Hack/Slash: Slice Hard. Trailers:Blood and Nuts (art & color: Skottie Young)Renegade Knife: Itai! (pencil: Sean Dove / color: J. Blaylock)Tub Club (pencil: T. Seeley / color: K. DeSousa)ORBITuary (pencil: M. Norton / color: BLOND)Dead Celebrities (pencil: S. Casseli / color: D. Rudoni)Once Bitten (pencil: J. Medors / color: BLOND)
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-07 23:10:49. [CVDB115862]
